name: ocndx

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(coc, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat1))
-| wceq(coc, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat1)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat1), cn)

⊢ (oc ` ndx)= cdc(1, 1)
⊣ oc = Slot(cdc(1, 1))
⊣ cdc(1, 1)∈ ℕ
